title: Razer Phone 2 - First Impressions!
description: The Razer Phone 2! Eber gets hands-on time with the next best gaming phone and we're excited to see a 2nd generation device from Razer to push the 120Hz display and incredible speakers. But is it enough to compete in 2018?  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below: Cooler Master MK750:   Razer Phone (Original):   Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Cooler Master. Thanks to Razer for the event invite. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:  Join Our Folding team   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #razerphone2 #razerphone2unboxing #hardwarecanucks
